definition: I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to understand tacitly (idiom)/to know intuitively/to understand thoroughly
to understand tacitly (idiom)/to know intuitively/to understand thoroughly

sentences.english: I'm after a size 40 V-neck pullover in grey.
sentences.chinese: 我要一件40号灰色鸡心领套衫。

sentences.english: "Yes, " she answered, with an air of quiet understanding.
sentences.chinese: “是的，”她回答，露出心领神会的神气。

sentences.english: I'd tell a joke in Fuling and the people would get it.
sentences.chinese: 在涪陵我可以讲个笑话，而人们总是心领神会。

sentences.english: A smile from a heart can only be realised by a heart, it allows no words in between.
sentences.chinese: 会心的微笑，只能心领神会，非文章词句所能表达。

sentences.english: Twins intuitively understand each other and use shortened sentences and words when they talk.
sentences.chinese: 因为他们心领神会，谈话时只需简短的句子和言词。

sentences.english: At the same time, a good number of families are struggling to make ends meet.
sentences.chinese: 在此同时，相当多的家庭正挣扎心领了。

sentences.english: Sam understands tacitly. He hoists his cup saying.
sentences.chinese: 山姆心领神会，举起酒杯。

sentences.english: When a horse neighs or paws the ground, the other horses get the message .
sentences.chinese: 当一匹马嘶鸣或以蹄扒地，其它的马心领神会。

definition: Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
(polite) thank you for your trouble (used when asking a favor or after having received one)
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
Don't get a reward if it's not deserved. (idiom)
